comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Dr. Jose Leal Prado (1918-1987). His wife was biochemist Eline Michelet Sant’Ana Prado (1921-2007). There's a slideshow than includes photos of them here: www.unifesp.br/dbioq/portal/index.php?option=com_rsgaller... Jose founded the Biomedical Sciences program at UFU: www.icbim.ufu.br/node/46

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content: These are nice details, Penny. Thank you!
